name: Sneaky Ball Go
description:
Tap the ball and follow the path until you reach the portal to the next level! Sounds easy but it's actually pretty hard.

Timing is everything. Stay patient. Tap and hold the screen at the right time to move the ball forward in the maze. Collect gems to unlock new balls and avoid the spikes and blocks.

Can you beat every level?

[Features]
◉ Enticingly crafted minimal maze puzzler game
◉ 50 frustrating (SUPER HARD) levels that tests your patience
◉ Simple, addictive minimal game play

Designed for human brains looking for a challenge.
